'''''Vinyar Tengwar 46''''' is the forty-sixth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|45|47}}

==Contents==
* "Addenda and Corrigenda to the ''[[Etymologies]]'', Part two"✫ — eds. Carl F. Hostetter and Patrick H. Wynne<br>with an appendix on the ''tengwar'' of the ''Etymologies'' by Arden R. Smith

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
